effects: Arkansas Code § 16‑90‑717 creates the Crime Victims Reparations Revolving Fund.  The statute provides that a continuing fund is established in the State Treasury for the Crime Victims Reparations Board.  All moneys received from any source and all interest earned remain in the fund.  The Board may budget and expend the moneys to implement the crime‑victim reparations program and the sexual‑assault statutes【759199032674464†L72-L83】.
